data.name: MakePlace
data.detailed_description:
MakePlace is a tool to preview, edit and share housing layouts.

Features:
  • Drag-and-drop furniture and items from a list
  • 100+ furniture to choose from
  • Freely modify furniture items
  • Move and rotate objects via drag-click or UI input
  • Save and load layouts from file

Controls
  • WSAD to move
  • Space to ascend, Z to descend
  • Right click and drag to pan the camera
  • Left click to Select items
  • Esc to deselect / quit
  • Del to delete selected item
  • Scroll up/down to increase/decrease movement speed
  • Enter to show/hide UI
  • Alt+Enter to use windowed mode


Get updates and troubleshooting help on Discord

data.short_description: A tool to preview, edit and share housing layouts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
